text: Loop Point
20XX
It's been 10 years after the 17th Battle Snake Tournament concluded and it's organizer, the Carrot Group, disappeared mysteriously.
The legendary sport of Battle Snake became nothing more than a footnote in history, long forgotten, until the Carrot Group leaders suddenly reappeared
and once again opened their doors to young competitors wishing to prove themselves.
Snake Tower
A crowd of excited youths has gathered around this iconic building that had been dormant for an entire decade.
Apple: Well, {0}, here we are!
Apple: Would you look at this crowd!?
Apple: I thought Battle Snake was more of a retro thing but looks like there were more fans than I thought!
Apple: C'mon, let's try to squeeze through this crowd and make our way in, {0}!
Apple: Woah...
Apple: This building certainly is extravagant, don't you think?
Apple: I heard that the CEO of Carrot Group designed it himself!
Apple: Rumor has it he designed it like a sprout to symbolize the growth of all the competitors reaching for the top!
Apple: A bit artsy-fartsy, if you ask me!
Apple: Ah!
Apple: Looks like registration is starting!
Apple: Let's go, {0}! Let's become Snake Battlers!!!
Apple: The registration desk is right there, {0}!
Receptionist: Welcome to Snake Tower!
Receptionist: Two competitors registered! Have fun Apple and {0} and good luck!
Apple: OH MY GOSH!
Apple: It's finally here...
Apple: I never thought I would compete... Heck, I never thought there would ever be another competition!!!
Apple: Let's go explore until the first battles start, {0}!!
Apple: Look at the size of this place...
Apple: We're really going to compete here, aren't we?
Apple: Hey, what gives?
Apple: It's quite rude to bump into someone and not apologize, you know!!!
Apple: Ah, he's already gone...
Apple: What a weird kid. I wonder what his problem is.
Apple: He was kind of cute though, don't you think {0}?
Announcer: ALL NEWLY REGISTERED PARTICIPANTS PLEASE MAKE YOUR WAY TO YOUR DESIGNATED BATTLE ARENAS
Announcer: TO PARTICIPATE IN YOUR PRELIMINARY BATTLES!
Apple: {0}! Let's run!
Apple: Oh, I almost forgot!
Apple: Good luck on your first round! Don't lose!
Apple: Good job, {0}!!!
Apple: Looks like we both made it through preliminaries!
Apple: It was quite easy for me, hehe!
Apple: Things will get harder from here.
